name: Point Hope
description:
You are a member of the United States Coast Guard, on a Search and Rescue operation, investigating a vessel found adrift off the coast of Alaska. When you arrive, you find that this is much more than just a simple case of a ship in distress.

Made with Love for the Senscape Adventurous Game Jam in 2020.

Production Docs:

We've included copies of the Production Docs that was the core of the game. It's my hope and intent when I find time, to clean up and release things as best I can for folks to use and learn from.
